ua.naiksoftware.simpletanks.res

Class Music

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.naiksoftware.simpletanks.res.Music

  • public class Music
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Naik on 25.07.15. Utility for easy music and sounds thread safe playback. Usage: in main activity in onCreate method call Music.init(getContext()), in onDestroy call Music.dispose(). After this you can play music and sounds anywhere: Music.playMusic(keyObject, R.raw.test)

      • playMusic

        public static void playMusic(java.lang.Object key,
                             int rawID,
                             boolean loop)
        Run playback long music file, for short see Music.playSound
        Parameters:
        key - - key for assign player to specified object
        rawID - - R.raw.[you music in /res/raw directory]
        loop - - if true - play looping, if already playing - doing nothing

        rawID - - R.raw.[...]

      • playSound

        public static void playSound(java.lang.Object key,
                             int rawID,
                             float volume,
                             boolean loop)
        Run playback sort music (sound). Sound will be loaded into memory.
        Parameters:
        key - - key for assign player to specified object
        rawID - - R.raw.[...]
        volume - - volume for left and right channels
        loop - - if true - play looping, if already playing - doing nothing

      • stopSound

        public static void stopSound(java.lang.Object key,
                             int rawID)
        Stop sound by rawID for specified object key.
        Parameters:
        key - - object key
        rawID - - R.raw.[...]
